name: Akari
description: Place bulbs to illuminate the grid while following the rules.
howtoplay: Place bulbs to illuminate the grid while following the rules.
Each bulb can only illuminate cells in a straight line (up, down, left, right) without crossing other bulbs.
A cell with a cross ('X') can be illuminated by bulbs from both the left and right, or up and down.

name: Loop The Loop
description: Connect the dots to create a single loop that doesn't cross itself.
howtoplay: Connect the dots to create a single loop that doesn't cross itself.
The loop must be a single continuous line, without any breaks or crossings.

name: Mini Sudoku
description: Fill the grid with numbers following Sudoku rules.
howtoplay: Fill the grid with numbers following Sudoku rules.
Each row, column, and MxM subgrid must contain all numbers 1 to M exactly once.
No number can appear twice in any row, column, or subgrid.
